notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: S.U.I. and S.J.D. contributed equally to design the study, R.H. performed the QA/QC on observational datasets, S.U.I. implemented the Air2Stream model to the FRB, performed the numerical simulations and analyzed the output data with support from R.H. R.H. and S.U.I. wrote the manuscript with contributions from S.J.D. and B.B. and all contributed to the discussion of the results and manuscript refinement and revisions.
